mapper.select: SELECT t.taskt_id,t.taskt_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM yd_task_typetr ttr WHERE ttr.taskttr_ttid = t.taskt_id AND ttr.taskttr_tid = #{taskId}) is_select FROM yd_task_type t
mapper.insert: insert into yd_task_typetr (taskttr_tid,taskttr_ttid,taskttr_name) value (#{taskId},#{typeId},(SELECT taskt_name FROM yd_task_type WHERE taskt_id = #{typeId}))
